Sometimes the information system calculates suggestions how to solve a problem. For example, it suggests how to spread payments to different budget lines. Or to give another example, the system provides you with ideas which indicators you might want to use for monitoring. Whenever this \grqq magic\grqq happens, you are presented with the \iconUiMagicS symbol. Now, in the manual the friendly wizard next to this paragraph indicates that such an option is available and he will tell you how to work with the \iconUiMagicS in that case.
